attributes.action: Acknowledge the presence of the Pagan faith in the United Kingdom and to offer it the governments support both financially and legally in the same way that all other religions expect to be acknowledged and supported.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Goverment spends millions of pounds of tax payers money building places of worship for Muslims, Hindus, Sikhs, Jews and other non-christian religions every year however we are yet to see any places of worship for Pagans/Wiccans and we are still highly stereotyped and chastised. 
In respect of this I would like to see positive government action supporting the continued practicing of this faith.
